briefTitle: Duloxetine in Patients With Suspected Functional Pancreatic/Biliary Pain (Sphincter of Oddi Dysfunction)
officialTitle: Pilot Study of the Efficacy and Tolerability of Duloxetine in Patients With Suspected Functional Pancreatic/Biliary Pain (Sphincter of Oddi Dysfunction).
summary:
Open-label single center study of duloxetine in patients with SOD who have failed to respond to the standard treatments.

This protocol is designed to explore the tolerability and efficacy of Duloxetine in the management of patients with known or suspected Sphincter of Oddi dysfunction (SOD).

primaryOutcome.measure: The Primary Outcome Measure Was a Patient Global Assessment of Change (PGIC) Scale.
